title: Ceiling Pro mobile-first marketing + booking + admin (frontend-only)

requirements.summary: Implement a mobile-first, premium white/natural visual design system with subtle scroll reveal animations and fast responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: All primary pages/sections render correctly on common mobile widths (e.g., 360px) with a mobile-first layout.
Site uses white/natural palette and maintains consistent typography/spacing across sections.
Scroll/section animations are subtle and do not block interaction or significantly impact performance.

file_operations.description: Create global styles and theme tokens (white background, light-grey sections, beige/soft green accents, modern sans-serif defaults, spacing), aligning Tailwind + shadcn-ui theming. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Extend Tailwind theme with brand-friendly semantic colors (accent/secondary/muted) and any required utility defaults for spacious mobile-first layout; keep animations lightweight. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add an IntersectionObserver-based hook to apply subtle section reveal on scroll without blocking interaction (prefers-reduced-motion friendly).
Create a reusable Section wrapper for consistent padding, max-width, background variants (white vs light-grey), and optional reveal-on-scroll behavior using the new hook.
Create the mobile-first homepage composition using the shared Section wrapper and spacing/typography rules.

requirements.summary: Build the homepage hero with generated background image, specified headline/subheadline, and CTAs for booking scroll and click-to-call.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero renders background image with readable overlay text on mobile.
Book Consultation button brings user to booking section/form.
Call Now button triggers a tel: link configured in one place (constant/config).

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero background image as a static asset (served directly from frontend/public).
Add centralized brand constants (phone number for tel:, WhatsApp number for wa.me, email, GST placeholder) so CTAs reference a single source of truth.

Implement hero UI with background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/ceilingpro-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, overlay text, and two CTAs using shadcn-ui Button for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire HeroSection into the homepage and connect the Book Consultation CTA to scroll/focus the booking form section.

requirements.summary: Add a services section with exactly 4 service cards (icons, descriptions, pricing text) and Book Now preselect behavior for the booking form.
acceptanceCriteria: Exactly 4 service cards are shown with the specified titles/descriptions/pricing text.
Each card shows an icon and a Book Now button.
Clicking Book Now preselects the chosen service in the booking form.

file_operations.description: Add generated service icon asset for POP & Gypsum as a static image.
Add generated service icon asset for PVC as a static image.
Add generated service icon asset for Wall Molding as a static image.
Add generated service icon asset for Gypsum Repair as a static image.
Define the canonical list of the 4 services (labels, default pricing text/rate mapping keys, icon paths, and identifiers) used consistently across services, booking, and estimate.
Render exactly 4 service cards with soft shadow and Book Now buttons using shadcn-ui Card + Button for consistent UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement lightweight prefill state (e.g., via URL hash/query or in-memory context) so ServicesSection can preselect a service in the booking form.
Wire ServicesSection into the homepage and connect Book Now actions to set preselected service + scroll to booking form.

requirements.summary: Add a 3-step “How it works” section with icons and mobile-friendly layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The 3 steps are displayed in order with icons and readable labels on mobile.

file_operations.description: Add generated icon for step 1 (book online) as a static image.
Add generated icon for step 2 (site visit & estimate) as a static image.
Add generated icon for step 3 (installation & clean finish) as a static image.
Implement the 3-step process section with icons from frontend/public/assets/generated and clean mobile-first spacing.
Wire HowItWorksSection into the homepage section order.

requirements.summary: Implement the booking form UI with required fields, fixed time slots with enabled/disabled state from backend, submission via backend call, and on-page confirmation.
acceptanceCriteria: Booking form enforces required fields and only allows the 4 fixed time slots (subject to enabled/disabled state).
Submitting a valid booking persists it in the backend and shows a confirmation message without a full page reload.
Admin dashboard reflects the newly created booking.

file_operations.description: Create a small wrapper hook around useActor to expose typed backend calls (createBooking, getTimeSlotAvailability, getServiceRates) for the booking experience.
Add React Query hook to load time slot availability and provide a stable loading/error API for the booking form.

Build the booking section and form UI (fields, validation, fixed slots 10:00 AM / 1:00 PM / 4:00 PM / 7:00 PM, disable unavailable slots) using shadcn-ui Form-related inputs (Input/Select/Button) where available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add client-side validation utilities (required fields, mobile number format, numeric area > 0) and map to user-friendly English error messages.
Wire BookingSection into the homepage and ensure it can receive a preselected service from ServicesSection and CTA scroll targets.
Extend prefill state to include service preselection and optional focus behavior for better mobile conversion.

requirements.summary: Create an admin panel page to view bookings (sortable by created date), edit service rates, toggle time slot availability, and export CSV.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin page shows a bookings table including at least: name, phone, location, property type, service, date, time slot, area, created-at.
Admin can edit and save the 4 service rates and see the estimate calculator and booking UI reflect updated rates.
Admin can enable/disable each slot and the booking form updates accordingly.
Export produces a valid CSV download containing all bookings.

file_operations.description: Add React Query hooks for loading bookings for the admin table and for invalidating/refetching after booking creation.
Add React Query hooks for reading/updating service rates and sharing cached values with the estimate calculator and booking UI.
Add mutation hook for updating time slot availability and invalidating availability queries used by the booking form.

Implement bookings table UI with sorting by created-at date and a CSV export action using shadcn-ui Table/Button components where available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement UI for editing the 3 numeric service rates (POP & Gypsum, PVC, Wall Molding) and saving via backend; show current values pulled from backend using shadcn-ui inputs/buttons. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement toggles for the 4 fixed slots (10am/1pm/4pm/7pm) with enabled/disabled state and save action; use shadcn-ui Switch/Button if present. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the admin dashboard page composing bookings table, service rates editor, and time slots editor with clear sections and mobile responsiveness.
Create the app shell and routing to include routes for the homepage and /admin, plus shared header/footer placement (no authentication added).
Add a header with brand name and a click-to-call button linked via config (accessible aria-label), and optional admin link.

requirements.summary: Add a live estimate calculator (Area × Service Rate) that updates instantly, uses backend-provided rates when available, and shows inspection message for gypsum repair.
acceptanceCriteria: Changing area or service updates the estimate immediately.
Gypsum Repair selection shows the inspection message instead of a numeric estimate.
Default rates match the specified values and can be overridden by admin-edited pricing.

file_operations.description: Implement estimate calculator UI with Area + Service inputs and instantaneous result rendering; use backend rates via useServiceRates hook with correct defaults and inspection message for repair. Use shadcn-ui inputs/buttons where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add mapping from service identifiers to rate keys and default rates (₹65/₹110/₹100) and mark gypsum repair as inspection-based.
Wire EstimateCalculatorSection into the homepage near services/booking to support conversion.

requirements.summary: Add trust/content sections (Why Choose, Gallery, Reviews, Contact) and footer with phone/email/GST placeholder.
acceptanceCriteria: All listed trust/content sections exist on the site and are styled consistently with the premium mobile-first design.
Footer displays phone, email, and a GST placeholder string.

file_operations.description: Add generated 'before' gallery image as a static asset.
Add generated 'after' gallery image as a static asset.
Implement 'Why Choose Ceiling Pro' section with the three bullets (Affordable, Skilled Experts, On-Time Delivery) and premium mobile-friendly styling.

Implement Before & After gallery using the generated images from frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-before-1.dim_1200x900.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-after-1.dim_1200x900.png.
Implement a customer reviews section with consistent typography and spacing (static content as no data source was requested).
Implement a contact section with phone/email from config and optional location text; keep user-facing text in English.
Create a clean footer that displays phone number, email, and a GST placeholder string using centralized config.
Wire trust/content sections and footer into the homepage in a cohesive order.

requirements.summary: Add mobile conversion UI: sticky bottom Book Consultation button, floating WhatsApp button, and header click-to-call button.
acceptanceCriteria: On mobile viewports, a sticky bottom Book Consultation CTA remains visible and opens/scrolls to the booking form.
Floating WhatsApp button opens a wa.me link (phone number configurable in one place).
Header call button triggers a tel: link and is accessible (proper aria-label).

file_operations.description: Implement a mobile-only sticky bottom 'Book Consultation' button that scrolls to/focuses the booking form using shadcn-ui Button styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement a floating WhatsApp button that opens wa.me using the configurable WhatsApp number from config.
Add/ensure the header click-to-call button uses config-provided tel: link and has an aria-label for accessibility.
Wire sticky and floating conversion components so they are present on the homepage and target the booking section.

requirements.summary: Add on-page SEO basics: title/meta description, semantic headings, and keyword-targeted content in relevant sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Page includes a meaningful <title> and meta description.
H1/H2 structure is semantic and includes the target keyword phrases naturally in section headings or body text.
Lighthouse SEO checks show no critical SEO errors (where applicable in a SPA context).

file_operations.description: Update <title> and add a meta description aligned to Ceiling Pro services and booking intent (no email claims).
Ensure semantic H1/H2 usage and incorporate relevant keywords naturally within headings/body text (e.g., POP false ceiling, PVC ceiling installation).
Include keyword phrases naturally in service titles/descriptions where appropriate (e.g., Wall molding services, Gypsum ceiling repair).

requirements.summary: Ensure no UI implies email notifications; confirmation messaging should only acknowledge booking submission/received.
acceptanceCriteria: No backend methods attempt to send email.
UI does not claim that an email is sent; confirmation only indicates booking submission/received.
No email API keys, SMTP settings, or third-party email integrations exist in the codebase.

file_operations.description: Use confirmation copy that only confirms booking was submitted/received and does not mention email notifications or sending details via email.
Ensure contact section copy does not promise email confirmations/notifications; keep wording strictly informational.

requirements.summary: Add the required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly in the UI (no backend image serving).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
Hero uses the generated background image.
Service cards and How-it-works steps use the generated icon assets.
Gallery uses the generated before/after images.

file_operations.description: Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/ceilingpro-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png for the hero background (static asset usage).

Reference the service icon assets from frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-pop-gypsum.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-pvc.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-wall-molding.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-gypsum-repair.dim_256x256.png.

Reference the step icon assets from frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-step-book.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-step-visit.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-step-install.dim_256x256.png.
Reference the gallery images from frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-before-1.dim_1200x900.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-after-1.dim_1200x900.png.
